meanings.definition: The period of darkness in each twenty-four hours; the time from sunset to sunrise.
meanings.sent1: During the night, the stars twinkle in the sky.
meanings.sent2: I like to sleep at night when it's dark outside.
meanings.sent3: The cat thought it was playtime at night and kept meowing.
meanings.sent4: In the night, the city becomes a blanket of twinkling lights.
meanings.sent5: The night enveloped the forest in a mysterious cloak of darkness.

meanings.definition: The darkness of night; the absence of light.
meanings.sent1: The night was so dark that I couldn't see my hand in front of my face.
meanings.sent2: I prefer to stargaze at night when the darkness enhances the view.
meanings.sent3: The night seemed to swallow up all the shadows in its darkness.
meanings.sent4: The night's darkness was like a thick blanket covering the world.
meanings.sent5: The deep night enveloped everything in its inky blackness.
